name: Happy Path - Buy Available Item
inputs: Find a MacBook Pro and buy 1 unit.
expected_behavior: The agent must find the MacBook Pro and successfully return an Order ID.

name: Sad Path - Non-existent Product
expected_behavior: The agent must search and clearly inform the user that the product is unavailable. It must NOT create an order.

name: Multi Quantity Math Validation
expected_behavior: The total must equal 400 dollars and a transaction ID must be returned.

name: Case Insensitivity
expected_behavior: The agent must successfully purchase regardless of case.

name: Plural Handling
expected_behavior: The agent must match the product even with partial name.

name: Excess Stock Request
expected_behavior: The agent must detect insufficient stock and refuse the purchase.

name: Zero Quantity Edge Case
expected_behavior: The agent must reject zero quantity purchases.

name: Negative Quantity Edge Case
expected_behavior: The agent must reject invalid negative quantity.

name: Cart Without Search
expected_behavior: If cart is empty, agent must say cart is empty.

name: Sequential Purchase Same Session
inputs: Buy 1 MacBook Pro. Then buy 1 Yonex Arcsaber 11 Pro.
expected_behavior: Both purchases must be processed correctly.

name: Synonym Variation
expected_behavior: Agent must treat purchase as buy.

name: Search Only
expected_behavior: Agent must list products and not attempt checkout.
